author: Paul Rankin
method: Place the chocolate, double cream, brandy and orange zest into a small saucepan and warm gently for three minutes, stirring gently To serve, place into a small clean bowl and serve with fingers of madeira cake to dip into the sauce.
ingredients: 50g/1¾oz dark chocolate, melted,  3 tbsp double cream,  25ml/1fl oz brandy,  ½ orange, zest only,  100g/3½oz madeira cake, cut into fingers, to serve
